items.description: The governor of `InIdiom` is not in a Idiom
There is no `ExtPos` feature on the head of an idiom
An `Idiom` depends of an `InIdiom` (nested idiom are not allowed)

items.pattern: pattern { e: M -> N; N [InIdiom]; X[!InIdiom, !Idiom]; X << e }
items.description: Discontinuous idiom (node `X` is in the span but is not included)
